00014 #ifndef U_MAGIC_H
00015 #define U_MAGIC_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/string.h>
00018 
00019 #include <magic.h>
00020 
00021 class U_EXPORT UMagic {
00022 public:
00023 
00024         // Check for memory error
00025         U_MEMORY_TEST
00026 
00027         // Allocator e Deallocator
00028         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00029         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00030 
00031         // COSTRUTTORI
00032 
00033         UMagic(int flags)
00034                 {
00035                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMagic, "%d", flags)
00036 
00037                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(magic)
00038 
00039                 (void) setFlags(flags);
00040                 }
00041 
00046         ~UMagic()
00047                 {
00048                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UMagic)
00049                 }
00050 
00051         // VARIE
00052 
00053         static void clear()
00054                 {
00055                 U_TRACE(1, "UMagic::clear()")
00056 
00057                 if (magic)
00058                         {
00059                         U_SYSCALL_VOID(magic_close, "%p", magic);
00060 
00061                         magic = 0;
00062                         }
00063                 }
00064 
00065         static const char* getError()
00066                 {
00067                 U_TRACE(1, "UMagic::getError()")
00068 
00069                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(magic)
00070 
00071                 const char* result = (const char*) U_SYSCALL(magic_error, "%p", magic);
00072 
00073                 U_RETURN(result);
00074                 }
00075 
00076         static bool setFlags(int flags = MAGIC_NONE)
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(1, "UMagic::setFlags(%d)", flags)
00079 
00080                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(magic)
00081 
00082                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(magic_setflags, "%p,%d", magic, flags) != -1);
00083 
00084                 U_RETURN(result);
00085                 }
00086 
00087         static bool init(int flags = MAGIC_MIME);
00088 
00089         static UString getType(const char* buffer, uint32_t buffer_len);
00090 
00091         static UString getType(const UString& buffer) { return getType(U_STRING_TO_PARAM(buffer)); }
00092 
00093         // DEBUG
00094 
00095 #ifdef DEBUG
00096         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00097 #endif
00098 
00099 protected:
00100         static magic_t magic;         /* pointer to magic :-) */
00101         static UString* str_default;
00102 
00103 private:
00104         UMagic(const UMagic&)            {}
00105         UMagic& operator=(const UMagic&) { return *this; }
00106 };
